PPI::Statement::Given(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation PPI::Statement::Given(3)

NAME

PPI::Statement::Given - Describes all compound statements

SYNOPSIS

  given ( foo ) {
      say $_;
  }

INHERITANCE

  PPI::Statement::Given
  isa PPI::Statement
      isa PPI::Node
          isa PPI::Element

DESCRIPTION

"PPI::Statement::Given" objects are used to describe switch statements, as described in perlsyn.

METHODS

"PPI::Statement::Given" has no methods beyond those provided by the standard PPI::Structure, PPI::Node and PPI::Element methods.

Got any ideas for methods? Submit a report to rt.cpan.org!

TO DO

- Write unit tests for this package

SUPPORT

See the support section in the main module.
